gui

Class JavaFXGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.JavaFXGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIConnector

    public class JavaFXGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIConnector
    Class to display the games' changes on the gui

      • JavaFXGUI

        public JavaFXGUI(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pnSelected,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label lblTurn,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] imgWssPlayerBoard,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][][] imgWwsAIBoards,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] imgVwsCurrentBank,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] imgVwsCurrentBankSelection,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] imgVwsNextBank,
                 javafx.scene.image.ImageView[][] imgVwsNextBankSelection,
                 javafx.scene.control.Label[] lblPlayerNameAndPoints)
        Constructor for this class
        Parameters:
        pnSelected - pane containing the current domino of the human player
        lblTurn - label displaying the information of whos' turn it is
        imgWssPlayerBoard - multi dimensional image view array representing the human players' board
        imgWwsAIBoards - multi dimensional image view array representing the Bots' board
        imgVwsCurrentBank - image view array representing the current rounds' bank
        imgVwsCurrentBankSelection - image view array containing / displaying the selection of the players on the current rounds' bank
        imgVwsNextBank - image view array representing the next rounds' bank
        imgVwsNextBankSelection - image view array containing / displaying the selection of the players on the next rounds' bank
        lblPlayerNameAndPoints - label array displaying the name and the points of each player

        public void setToBank(int ordBank,
                      Bank bank)
        Description copied from interface: GUIConnector
        sets a domino to the players bank at index. Empties it if domino is null.
        Specified by:
        setToBank in interface GUIConnector
        Parameters:
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank that will be updated (0 for current, 1 for next bank)
        bank - reference to the bank that will be displayed / updated on the gui

                                       Pos pos)

        pos - pos to check
